product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
The banner features a promotional design with a feminine and elegant aesthetic, targeted at women and girls. The layout is evenly split into four quadrants, each with subtle pink shades in the background, overlaid with diagonal crisscross lines and pastel gradient circles that create depth.

At the top left, the **brand_name** text is boldly displayed, immediately grabbing attention. Below it, the **heading** text presents a two-line product description with a luxury serif typeface. On the right side, the **product_image** showcases a pair of rose gold earrings centered prominently.

The lower left quadrant uses **description** text to list key product features with bullet points in a clean sans-serif font. Below that, the **price** text stands out in a contrasting, bold pink, making the cost clear. A rounded rectangle button (**cta_background**) with a **cta** label encourages purchasing, positioned at the bottom.

Decorative pink swirls and dots adorn the corners, complementing the circular background elements.

**Color Palette:**  
- #FFF5F5 – Soft blush background  
- #FFEFF2 – Light pink segment  
- #FFE2E8 – Light rose tint  
- #FFBFCC – Warm coral pink  
- #D95F80 – Deep rose (text, CTA)  
- #B2475D – Dark mauve (heading text)  
- #333333 – Dark gray (feature list)  
- #FFFFFF – White (CTA text, highlights)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a dominant soft rose gold and blush pink tone, accented by clear, sparkling crystals. The color palette ideal for an advertisement banner should revolve around **Blush Pink (#F8B6B8)**, **Rose Gold (#E6A9A1)**, **Diamond White (#FFFFFF)**, and **Crystal Sparkle (#E1E1E1)**. The rose gold encases and outlines the pink petal shapes, giving depth and sophistication, while the crystalline stones add brilliance through light reflection. The blend of metallic and soft pastel tones contrasts yet harmonizes beautifully, offering both opulence and delicacy—perfect for a luxurious and feminine visual appeal.
